attributes.action: TV Adverts about the highyway code to refresh our memories!
attributes.additional_details:
Have you ever got to boiling point whilst driving, at the other drivers on the road who obviously have no idea what a road sign means, or that you are supposed to increase your speed when joining a motorway to that of the traffic already on there, NOT slow down?  Hugging the middle lane! it makes me want to SCREAM!!!
Everyday Whilst on the road I see errors made all the time, the Older generation are unfortunately the worst, they cause more accidents than are involved in and don't even realise it!
Why can't public Information ads be shown on TV giving information about road signs and the protocol when on a motorway, I am sure that most of us have forgotten more than we remember about the highway code, and I am sure a couple of ads during the course of the day would make a world of difference. Please sign this petition to make our roads safer and driving more enjoyable for all.
